title: Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic returns to Liberty State Park with star-studded guest list (PHOTOS)
content: JERSEY CITYÂ -- The Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic returned to Liberty State Park for its 11th anniversary, featuring an afternoon of polo in the summer sun with dozens of celebrities attending. The event, hosted by the luxury champagne company, Veuve Clicquot, featured a polo match where Team Veuve Clicquot -- led by world-renowned polo player Nacho Figueras -- competed against Team Liberty Comets. A number of high-profile celebrities were in attendance, including Penelope Cruz, Sienna Miller, Sam Rockwell and Coco Rocha. Proceeds from the event were donated to the Friends of Liberty State Park. Ticket prices ranged from $85 for general admission to $450 for an "exclusive and intimate" experience.
